description.full: Single Player, Xbox Live Multiplayer 1-8, HD (High Definition). Buy the full version of Street Trace:NYC! You get upgradeable weapons and boards, nine playable characters, six areas, and seven rule sets. Beat the Single-Player Campaign by winning Platinum Medals in all five Tournaments and Time Trials. Battle with up to four players in split-screen or eight players on Xbox Live®. Medals and best Lap Times appear on the Xbox Live leaderboards. Earn achievements to raise your gamerscore. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Looking for a tricked-out, edgy combat racing experience? Check out Street Trace:NYC on Xbox Live Arcade!  A war for corporate control has transformed society’s streets into a bloody industrial battleground. In New York City, powerful business cabals lord over Manhattan, as the oppressed scrape out survival within its outer boroughs. From the ashes of a failed rebellion emerges a new and dangerous sport - Street Trace.  Fire up your custom hoverboard and lay trail along New York City’s sprawlin…
